COMMENT_TX: Yankees catcher Gary Sanchez left the game due to an injured arm
replay,5,trumm001,BAL,gormb901,BAL12,,Y,M,BAL,C $when Mark Trumbo was called out at 1B, Orioles manager Buck Showalter challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,7,schoj001,BAL,gormb901,BAL12,,Y,M,NYA,A $when Joey Rickard was called safe at 2B, Yankees manager Joe Girardi challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay

replay,8,trumm001,BAL,wendh902,BAL12,,N,M,BAL,C $Manny Machado made a hard slide into Dustin Pedroia beyond the bag but was not called for runner interference; Pedroia was helped off the field; Orioles manager Buck Showalter challenged the out call; the ruling was upheld by replay
Dustin Pedroia left with an injured leg
ej,buttb801,C,porta901,Interference non-call Red Sox Third Base Coach Brian Butterfield ejected by 3B umpire Alan Porter arguing the non-call on Machado in the previous inning
Red Sox third baseman Pablo Sandoval left the game due to an injured knee
replay,7,schoj001,BAL,wendh902,BAL12,,Y,M,BOS,C $when Jonathan Schoop was called safe at 1B, Red Sox manager John Farrell challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay

ej,barnm001,P,fleta901,Throwing behind batter $Matt Barnes threw his first pitch behind Manny Machado's head; the ball struck the bat; Barnes ejected by HP umpire Andy Fletcher; Edwin Rodriguez had thrown at Machado in the sixth inning as retaliation for Machado injuring Dustin Pedroia with a slide on 4/21
replay,4,petes002,TBA,kellj901,BAL12,,N,M,BAL,O $when Shane Peterson's hit to RF was ruled a fair ball, Orioles manager Buck Showalter challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
$pitcher Wade Miley struck on the left wrist
$Wade Miley struck on the leg and left with a bruised wrist
replay,1,trumm001,BAL,emmep901,BAL12,,Y,M,BAL,C $when Mark Trumbo was called out at 1B, Orioles manager Buck Showalter challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay

ej,murpd006,P,diazl901,Called third strike Nationals second baseman Daniel Murphy ejected by HP umpire Laz Diaz
replay,10,machm001,BAL,nelsj901,BAL12,,Y,M,BAL,C $when Joey Rickard was called out at 2B, Orioles manager Buck Showalter challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,2,schoj001,BAL,mealj901,BAL12,,Y,M,BAL,C $when Jonathan Schoop was called out at 1B, Orioles manager Buck Showalter challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay

replay,7,smoaj001,TOR,mealj901,BAL12,,Y,M,BAL,I $when Justin Smoak reached 1B on a strikeout plus a wild pitch, Orioles manager Buck Showalter challenged the ruling; the pitch struck Smoak; the call was overturned to a strikeout, thus taking a run off the board
replay,1,bautj002,TOR,mealj901,BAL12,,Y,M,TOR,C $when Ezequiel Carrera was called out at 2B, Blue Jays manager John Gibbons challenged the ruling; the call overturned by replay
replay,3,goinr001,TOR,mealj901,BAL12,,Y,M,TOR,C $when Ryan Goins was called out at 1B, Blue Jays manager John Gibbons challenged the ruling; the call overturned by replay
replay,3,dozib001,MIN,reynj901,BAL12,,N,M,BAL,O $Brian Dozier's hit down the LF line was called a fair ball; Orioles manager Buck Showalter challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
replay,5,refsr001,NYA,millb901,BAL12,,Y,M,BAL,C $when Chase Headley was called safe at 2B, Orioles manager Buck Showalter challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,6,jonea003,BAL,nelsj901,BAL12,I,N,U,,H $Adam Jones' fly ball to LF was caught by a fan in the first row; crew chief Jeff Nelson requested a review, which upheld the call
replay,7,manct001,BAL,nelsj901,BAL12,,Y,M,BOS,C $when Trey Mancini was called safe at 1B, Red Sox, manager John Farrell challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,1,trumm001,BAL,nelsj901,BAL12,,Y,M,BAL,A $when Joey Rickard was called out at 3B, Orioles manager Buck Showalter challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay

replay,4,manct001,BAL,nelsj901,BAL12,,Y,M,BOS,D $when Mookie Betts was ruled not to have caught Trey Mancini's line drive, Red Sox manager John Farrell challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
Pirates pitcher Ivan Nova left the game due to an injured knee
$Pirate catcher Francisco Cervelli struck on the mask by a foul ball and left with concussion-like symptoms
$McCutchen spiked Orioles third baseman Manny Machado on left wrist sliding into third, Machado left the game next inning
replay,11,freed001,PIT,laynj901,BAL12,,Y,M,PIT,A $when Gregory Polanco was called out at 1B on a pickoff attempt, Pirates manager Clint Hurdle challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
$originally scored as error, changed to single on 06-22-2017, making both runs in inning earned
Orioles shortstop J.J. Hardy left the game due to an injured wrist
replay,1,schoj001,BAL,millb901,BAL12,,N,M,CLE,A $when Manny Machado was called safe at 1B, Indians manager Terry Francona challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
$ER responsibility changed on 07-20-2017 to give Perez one more and Bush one fewer
$umpires reviewed call of double for Gurriel; call was overturned - home run

$Moran fouled first pitch off left cheek and was down for several minutes, finally leaving on medical cart; admitted to local hospital with facial fracture which may need surgery; placed on DL next morning
$Gentry out for batter's interference with catcher

ej,,mousm001,P,tumpj901,Arguing called third strike ej,,yoste001,M,tumpj901,Arguing called third strike $Mike Moustakas ejected by plate umpire Tumpane for arguing called third strike; KC manager Yost also argued and was ejected
$Fan interference for double
$Orioles challenged call that Beckham was out at 3rd; call was upheld - out trying to advance
$Angels challenged call that Revere was out at second; call was overturned - safe at 2nd on missed catch error
$Orioles challenged call that Trout was safe at 2nd on stolen base attempt; call was overturned - caught stealing

$JC Ramirez left with injured arm

$Orioles challenged call that Joseph was out at 2nd to complete double play; call was overturned - line out, no DP

$Craig Gentry left with injured hand

$umpires reviewed call that Donaldson was out at 1st; call was upheld - ground out
$Marcus Stroman left with injured elbow

$Dustin Pedroia left with injured head
